pages.text: In this stage, you gain access to synchrotrons and more specialized accelerators and particle chambers. This will give you access to a variety of recipes and new materials.

pages.title: Synchrotron
pages.text: $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/ring_accelerator)Synchrotron Accelerators$(/l) accelerate particles in a ring, to high energies $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/linear_accelerator)linear accelerators$(/l) can't easily  achieve. Synchrotrons will be able to accelerate particles to very high energies, required for several recipes that either aid progression, or are required to progress to the next stage.

Synchrotrons are needed to produce materials such as:$(li)Strontium need to make BSCCO superconductor for advanced components and recipes $(li)Yttrium for YAG used in lasers$(br2)They also provide an alternative way to make many elements such as Titanium, Neodymium, Hafnium, Tungsten, Osmium, Iridium, Platinum, Mercury, Bismuth and Polonium.

pages.title: Other Stuff
pages.text: Also in this stage though not required to progress you have access to $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/beam_diverter)beam diverters$(/l) and $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/beam_splitter)beam splitter$(/l) for manipulation of particle beams, $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/decelerator)decelerators$(/l) to slow down particles and $(l:multiblocks/particle_chambers/collision_chamber)collision chambers$(/l) to smash particles into each other and truly make a large hadron collider!$(br2)There is also the $(l:items_and_devices/hev_suit)HEV suit$(/l) which is a good power armor with ability that is also a better hazmat suit.

pages.title: Next Stage Materials
pages.text: For the next stage you will need a bunch of BSCCO (Bismuth Strontium Calcium Copper Oxide, pronounced 'bisko') wire, osmium and iridium for osmiridium. These are used a lot in $(l:multiblocks/vacuum_chambers/general)vacuum chambers$(/l). You will also need a little bit of yttrium and neodymium for neodymium YAG lasers.
